details.title: Thermal Instability and Secondary Breakdown in Power Transistors
details.abstract: An analytic solution is obtained for the three-dimensional heat diffusion equation applied to a model for a multifinger power transistor. It predicts that the thermal instability takes place based on localized heating and positive feedback. The condition of thermal stability found by Navon and Miller [1] differs from that encountered in this paper.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
